text: Mejbil Fartous (; born on 6 July 1950) is an Iraqi coach and former footballer, he played as a defender. ==International goals== ;Iraq national football team goals :Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" ! # !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !! Competition |- | 1. || 6 April 1976 || Doha, Qatar|| || 4–0 || 4–0 ||4th Arabian Gulf Cup |- |} ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Al-Quwa Al-Jawiya *Iraqi Premier League: 1974–75 *Iraq Central FA League: 1972–73, 1973–74 *Iraq Central FA Cup: 1973–74 ===International=== *Palestine Cup of Nations runner- up: 1975 *Arabian Gulf Cup runner-up: 1976 === Individual === *4th Arabian Gulf Cup Best Defender Award ==References== ==External links== *Iraq - Record International Players at rsssf.com * Category:Iraqi footballers Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Al-Quwa Al-Jawiya players Category:Iraq international footballers Category:Sportspeople from Baghdad Category:Association football defenders Category:Iraqi football managers Category:Expatriate football managers in the United Arab Emirates Category:Expatriate football managers in Qatar Category:Al-Quwa Al-Jawiya managers
title: Mejbel Fartous
